DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : Assess different potential algorithm improve service cost utility diagnosis treatment obstructive sleep apnea syndrome ( OSAS ) patient high pretest probability Hong Kong . Hypothesis : Newer home sleep study device algorithm provide alternative inpatient sleep study Design : Prospective randomize study Subject : High pretest probability OSAS patient refer tertiary centre . Study instrument : portable sleep study device , AutoCPAP inpatient sleep monitoring system . Interventions : comparison 3 different algorithms health service OSA patient would make : conventional in-patient sleep study , empirical treatment home sleep study . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome validity home sleep study device compare inpatient sleep study . The secondary outcome relative efficacy different algorithms number fail procedure algorithm .
